attributes.action: Prevent the Government leaving the EU without a deal on October 31st, 2019.
attributes.additional_details: One only has to look at the reports from the CBI. Businesses are nowhere near preparing for no deal. The governor of the Bank of England, Mark Carney has also raised his concerns.
attributes.background: I accept the decision by voters to leave the European Union, but I am also mindful of the distinct possibility that leaving without a deal could have a detrimental effect on the economy and cause massive problems in Ireland. I concerned at the casual approach taken to ‘no deal’ by this government.
